        Returns:

      • getAllIoTDeviceCores

        java.util.Map<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>,java.lang.Integer> getAllIoTDeviceCores()
        get a list of registered IoT Devices with the number of cores
        Returns:
        a Map with host as key and number of cores as value

        gets a list with all IoT devices in the cluster
        Returns:
        a list with all sensing devices in the cluster

        Returns:

      • getSensingData

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,JCL_Sensor> getSensingData(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
                                                           java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sensorNickname)
        retrieves the last 10 collected data of a sensor
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device which the sensor is configured
        sensorNickname - The sensor to collect the sensing data
        Returns:
        a Map with the last 10 collected data of the sensor

      • getAllSensingData

        retrieves all collected data of a sensor
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device which the sensor is configured
        sensorNickname - The sensor to collect the sensing data
        Returns:
        a Map with all the sensing data of the sensor

      • getLastSensingData

        retrieves the last collected data of a sensor
        Parameters:

        sensorNickname - The sensor to collect the last sensing data
        Returns:

      • getSensingDataNow

        JCL_Sensor getSensingDataNow(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
                             java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sensorNickname)
        allows active sensing, collecting the sensing data at the given moment
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device where the active sensing will occurr
        sensorNickname - The sensor where the data will be retrieved
        Returns:
        a JCL_Sensor with the collected data

      • getSensorMetadata

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSensorMetadata(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
                                                                   java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sensorNickname)
        retrieves all information about the sensor configuration
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device where the sensor is configured
        sensorNickname - The sensor to get the metadata
        Returns:
        a Map with all the metadata of the sensor

      • turnOn

        boolean turnOn(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname)
        turn the device on, enabling passive sensing and allowing receiving commands
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device to turn on
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the device was turned on

      • standBy

        boolean standBy(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname)
        puts the device in an standby mode. In this mode the device stops passive sensing and stops receiving commands.
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device to put on standby mode
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the device was put on standby mode

      • setSensorMetadata

        boolean setSensorMetadata(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
                          java.lang.String sensorAlias,
                          int sensorId,
                          int sensorSize,
                          int sensorSampling,
                          java.lang.String inputOrOutput)
        allows the configuration of a sensor on the device
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device where the sensor will be configured
        sensorAlias - An alias for the sensor
        sensorId - The pin where the sensor will be configured
        sensorSize - Indicates the maximum size in MB which will be used to store the collected sensor data
        sensorSampling - Indicates the interval to collect sensor data performed by the passive sensing
        inputOrOutput - An String indicating the direction of the sensor ("input" or "output")
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the sensor was configured

      • removeSensor

        boolean removeSensor(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
                     java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sensorNickname)
        removes a previously configured sensor from a device
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device where the sensor is configured
        sensorNickname - The sensor to remove
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whter the sensor was removed

      • acting

        boolean acting(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname,
               java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> actuatorNickname,
               java.lang.Object[] commands)
        executes a sequence of commands on the actuator
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - The device where the actuator is configured
        actuatorNickname - The actuator where the commands will be executed
        commands - a sequence of commands
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the action was done

      • setConfig

        boolean setConfig(JCL_Configuration configuration)
        configure a device according to an configuration instance
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to be deployed on the device
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the configuration was loaded

      • getConfig

        JCL_Configuration getConfig(java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> deviceNickname)
        gets the configuration of an device
        Parameters:
        deviceNickname - the device to get the configuration
        Returns:
        the configuration of the device
